paragraphs: The famous British stand-up comedian and actor Ricky Gervais will perform in Prague. The concert will take place at the Congress Centre on March 4, 2023. This was announced by the organizers.
The artist will present his new comedy program called Armageddon.
The pre-sale of tickets will start on December 14 for Live Nation Klub members. All others will be able to purchase them starting from December 16 through Ticketmaster.
Subscribe to our TELEGRAM channel, where news comes out faster.
